byline.original: By JERRY GARRETT, JAMES G. COBB, PHIL PATTON, STUART ELLIOTT, JOHN PEARLEY HUFFMAN and NORMAN MAYERSOHN

abstract: Introduction to articles highlighting history of Chevrolet car brand, which celebrates its 100th birthday in November 2011.
snippet: Chevrolet’s history includes many missteps, but it’s the marvelous cars it produced while baby boomers were growing up that have made Chevy such an endearing part of American culture.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: Chevrolet’s history includes many missteps, but it’s the marvelous cars it produced while baby boomers were growing up that have made Chevy such an endearing part of American culture.

headline.main: A Century of Chevy, From Cheap Date to America’s Sweetheart
headline.print_headline: A Century of Chevy, From Cheap Date to America’s Sweetheart
headline.seo: Chevrolet: Unlikely Cornerstone for General Motors
